entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:37 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 6:50 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 6. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
